function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear SOP guidelines from the authority","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance and confusion among laborers","Mitigation":"Regular communication and training on updated SOP guidelines","Technologies":"Communication and training software","People":"Workers, subcontractors, site managers","Owner":"Site management team"},{"Description":"Uncertainty due to government instruction changes","Impact":"Operational disruption and lack of clarity for contractors","Mitigation":"Regular updates and clear communication from authority","Technologies":"Communication and notification systems","People":"Contractors, site managers","Owner":"Authority and project management"},{"Description":"Complicated workforce management on mega projects","Impact":"Difficulty in coordination and control of a large number of laborers","Mitigation":"Implementation of digital workforce management tools and standardized protocols","Technologies":"Digital workforce management software, standardized protocols","People":"Site managers, subcontractors","Owner":"Project management team"}]}
